virtual SystematicCode sysApplySystematicVariation (const SystematicSet &systConfig)
 Function receiving the systematic variations that should be applied.

Detailed Description

A simple implementation of the muon correction tool interface

This tries to be a simple, but meaningful example of how correction tools should be implemented for Run 2.
